createPod(string,string,string).details: only MODERATOR_ROLE role can create pods Requirements: - pod should not exist before.

mintPodTokenById(string,address,uint256).details: Moderator will mint the amount of pod token for the investor's account Requirements: - the caller must MODERATOR_ROLE to perform this action.
